# Copilot Instructions - Game Development Workspace

This workspace is configured for game development with TypeScript and modern frameworks.

## Project Overview
- **Type**: Game Development
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Framework**: Phaser 3 or Babylon.js
- **Setup Status**: In Progress

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow modular architecture patterns
- Keep game logic separate from rendering
- Use WebGL for graphics rendering
- Include comprehensive testing for game mechanics

- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements
- [ ] Scaffold the Project
- [ ] Customize the Project
- [ ] Install Required Extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project
- [ ] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete
